00025 /**
00026  * The Push Notification Message.
00027  *
00028  * The class represents a message to be delivered to an end user device.
00029  * Notification Service.
00030  *
00031  * @ingroup ApnsPHP_Message
00032  * @see http://tinyurl.com/ApplePushNotificationPayload
00033  */
00034 class ApnsPHP_Message
00035 {
00036     const PAYLOAD_MAXIMUM_SIZE = 256; /**< @type integer The maximum size allowed for a notification payload. */
00037 
00038     protected $_bAutoAdjustLongPayload = true; /**< @type boolean If the JSON payload is longer than maximum allowed size, shorts message text. */
00039 
00040     protected $_aDeviceTokens = array(); /**< @type array Recipients device tokens. */
00041 
00042     protected $_sText; /**< @type string Alert message to display to the user. */
00043     protected $_nBadge; /**< @type integer Number to badge the application icon with. */
00044     protected $_sSound; /**< @type string Sound to play. */
00045 
00046     protected $_sCustomPropertyName; /**< @type string Custom property name. */
00047     protected $_mCustomPropertyValue; /**< @type mixed Custom property value. */
00048 
00049     protected $_nExpiryValue = 604800; /**< @type integer That message will expire in 604800 seconds (86400 * 7, 7 days) if not successful delivered. */
00050 
00051     protected $_mCustomIdentifier; /**< @type mixed Custom message identifier. */
00052 
00053     /**
00054      * Constructor.
00055      *
00056      * @param  $sDeviceToken @type string @optional Recipients device token.
00057      */
00058     public function __construct($sDeviceToken = null)
00059     {
00060         if (isset($sDeviceToken)) {
00061             $this->addRecipient($sDeviceToken);
00062         }
00063     }
00064 
00065     /**
00066      * Add a recipient device token.
00067      *
00068      * @param  $sDeviceToken @type string Recipients device token.
00069      * @throws ApnsPHP_Message_Exception if the device token
00070      *         is not well formed.
00071      */
00072     public function addRecipient($sDeviceToken)
00073     {
00074         if (!preg_match('~[a-f0-9]{64}~i', $sDeviceToken)) {
00075             throw new ApnsPHP_Message_Exception(
00076                 "Invalid device token '{$sDeviceToken}'"
00077             );
00078         }
00079         $this->_aDeviceTokens[] = $sDeviceToken;
00080     }
00081 
00082     /**
00083      * Get a recipient.
00084      *
00085      * @param  $nRecipient @type integer @optional Recipient number to return.
00086      * @throws ApnsPHP_Message_Exception if no recipient number
00087      *         exists.
00088      * @return @type string The recipient token at index $nRecipient.
00089      */
00090     public function getRecipient($nRecipient = 0)
00091     {
00092         if (!isset($this->_aDeviceTokens[$nRecipient])) {
00093             throw new ApnsPHP_Message_Exception(
00094                 "No recipient at index '{$nRecipient}'"
00095             );
00096         }
00097         return $this->_aDeviceTokens[$nRecipient];
00098     }
00099 
00100     /**
00101      * Get the number of recipients.
00102      *
00103      * @return @type integer Recipient's number.
00104      */
00105     public function getRecipientsNumber()
00106     {
00107         return count($this->_aDeviceTokens);
00108     }
00109 
00110     /**
00111      * Get all recipients.
00112      *
00113      * @return @type array Array of all recipients device token.
00114      */
00115     public function getRecipients()
00116     {
00117         return $this->_aDeviceTokens;
00118     }
00119 
00120     /**
00121      * Set the alert message to display to the user.
00122      *
00123      * @param  $sText @type string An alert message to display to the user.
00124      */
00125     public function setText($sText)

00127         $this->_sText = $sText;
00128     }

00131      * Get the alert message to display to the user.
00132      *
00133      * @return @type string The alert message to display to the user.

00135     public function getText()
00136     {
00137         return $this->_sText;
00138     }

00140     /**
00141      * Set the number to badge the application icon with.
00142      *
00143      * @param  $nBadge @type integer A number to badge the application icon with.
00144      * @throws ApnsPHP_Message_Exception if badge is not an
00145      *         integer.
00146      */
00147     public function setBadge($nBadge)
00148     {
00149         if (!is_int($nBadge)) {
00150             throw new ApnsPHP_Message_Exception(
00151                 "Invalid badge number '{$nBadge}'"
00152             );
00153         }
00154         $this->_nBadge = $nBadge;
00155     }

00158      * Get the number to badge the application icon with.
00159      *
00160      * @return @type integer The number to badge the application icon with.

00165     }

00167     /**
00168      * Set the sound to play.
00169      *
00170      * @param  $sSound @type string @optional A sound to play ('default sound' is
00171      *         the default sound).
00172      */
00173     public function setSound($sSound = 'default')
00174     {
00175         $this->_sSound = $sSound;
00176     }

00188     /**
00189      * Set a custom property.
00190      *
00191      * @param  $sName @type string Custom property name.
00192      * @param  $mValue @type mixed Custom property value.
00193      * @throws ApnsPHP_Message_Exception if custom property name is not outside
00194      *         the Apple-reserved 'aps' namespace.
00195      */
00196     public function setCustomProperty($sName, $mValue)
00197     {
00198         if ($sName == 'aps') {
00199             throw new ApnsPHP_Message_Exception(
00200                 "Property name 'aps' can not be used for custom property."
00201             );
00202         }
00203         $this->_sCustomPropertyName = trim($sName);
00204         $this->_mCustomPropertyValue = $mValue;
00205     }
00206

00208      * Get the custom property name.
00209      *
00210      * @return @type string The custom property name.
00211      */
00212     public function getCustomPropertyName()

00214         return $this->_sCustomPropertyName;
00215     }

00218      * Get the custom property value.

00220      * @return @type mixed The custom property value.

00222     public function getCustomPropertyValue()
00223     {
00224         return $this->_mCustomPropertyValue;
00225     }

00227     /**
00228      * Set the auto-adjust long payload value.
00229      *
00230      * @param  $bAutoAdjust @type boolean If true a long payload is shorted cutting
00231      *         long text value.
00232      */
00233     public function setAutoAdjustLongPayload($bAutoAdjust)
00234     {
00235         $this->_bAutoAdjustLongPayload = (boolean)$bAutoAdjust;
00236     }
00237 
00238     /**
00239      * Get the auto-adjust long payload value.
00240      *
00241      * @return @type boolean The auto-adjust long payload value.
00242      */
00243     public function getAutoAdjustLongPayload()
00244     {
00245         return $this->_bAutoAdjustLongPayload;
00246     }
00247 
00248     /**
00249      * PHP Magic Method. When an object is "converted" to a string, JSON-encoded
00250      * payload is returned.
00251      *
00252      * @return @type string JSON-encoded payload.
00253      */
00254     public function __toString()
00255     {
00256         try {
00257             $sJSONPayload = $this->getPayload();
00258         } catch (ApnsPHP_Message_Exception $e) {
00259             $sJSONPayload = '';
00260         }
00261         return $sJSONPayload;
00262     }
00263 
00264     /**
00265      * Convert the message in a JSON-encoded payload.
00266      *
00267      * @throws ApnsPHP_Message_Exception if payload is longer than maximum allowed
00268      *         size and AutoAdjustLongPayload is disabled.
00269      * @return @type string JSON-encoded payload.
00270      */
00271     public function getPayload()
00272     {
00273         $aPayload['aps'] = array();
00274 
00275         if (isset($this->_sText)) {
00276             $aPayload['aps']['alert'] = (string)$this->_sText;
00277         }
00278         if (isset($this->_nBadge) && $this->_nBadge > 0) {
00279             $aPayload['aps']['badge'] = (int)$this->_nBadge;
00280         }
00281         if (isset($this->_sSound)) {
00282             $aPayload['aps']['sound'] = (string)$this->_sSound;
00283         }
00284 
00285         if (isset($this->_sCustomPropertyName, $this->_mCustomPropertyValue)) {
00286             $aPayload[$this->_sCustomPropertyName] = $this->_mCustomPropertyValue;
00287         }
00288 
00289         $sJSONPayload = json_encode($aPayload, JSON_FORCE_OBJECT);
00290         $nJSONPayloadLen = strlen($sJSONPayload);
00291 
00292         if ($nJSONPayloadLen > self::PAYLOAD_MAXIMUM_SIZE) {
00293             if ($this->_bAutoAdjustLongPayload) {
00294                 $nTextLen = strlen($this->_sText);
00295                 if ($nJSONPayloadLen - $nTextLen <= self::PAYLOAD_MAXIMUM_SIZE) {
00296                     $this->_sText = substr($this->_sText, 0, $nTextLen - ($nJSONPayloadLen - self::PAYLOAD_MAXIMUM_SIZE));
00297                     return $this->getPayload();
00298                 } else {
00299                     throw new ApnsPHP_Message_Exception(
00300                         "JSON Payload is too long: {$nJSONPayloadLen} bytes. Maximum size is " .
00301                         self::PAYLOAD_MAXIMUM_SIZE . " bytes. The message text can not be auto-adjusted."
00302                     );
00303                 }
00304             } else {
00305                 throw new ApnsPHP_Message_Exception(
00306                     "JSON Payload is too long: {$nJSONPayloadLen} bytes. Maximum size is " .
00307                     self::PAYLOAD_MAXIMUM_SIZE . " bytes"
00308                 );
00309             }
00310         }
00311 
00312         return $sJSONPayload;
00313     }
00314 
00315     /**
00316      * Set the expiry value.
00317      *
00318      * @param  $nExpiryValue @type integer This message will expire in N seconds
00319      *         if not successful delivered.
00320      */
00321     public function setExpiry($nExpiryValue)
00322     {
00323         if (!is_int($nExpiryValue)) {
00324             throw new ApnsPHP_Message_Exception(
00325                 "Invalid seconds number '{$nExpiryValue}'"
00326             );
00327         }
00328         $this->_nExpiryValue = $nExpiryValue;
00329     }
00330 
00331     /**
00332      * Get the expiry value.
00333      *
00334      * @return @type integer The expire message value (in seconds).
00335      */
00336     public function getExpiry()
00337     {
00338         return $this->_nExpiryValue;
00339     }
00340 
00341     /**
00342      * Set the custom message identifier.
00343      *
00344      * The custom message identifier is useful to associate a push notification
00345      * to a DB record or an User entry for example. The custom message identifier
00346      * can be retrieved in case of error using the getCustomIdentifier()
00347      * method of an entry retrieved by the getErrors() method.
00348      * This custom identifier, if present, is also used in all status message by
00349      * the ApnsPHP_Push class.
00350      *
00351      * @param  $mCustomIdentifier @type mixed The custom message identifier.
00352      */
00353     public function setCustomIdentifier($mCustomIdentifier)
00354     {
00355         $this->_mCustomIdentifier = $mCustomIdentifier;
00356     }
00357 
00358     /**
00359      * Get the custom message identifier.
00360      *
00361      * @return @type mixed The custom message identifier.
00362      */
00363     public function getCustomIdentifier()
00364     {
00365         return $this->_mCustomIdentifier;
00366     }
00367 }
